channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-6824] Hive HBase query fails on Tez due to missing jars - part 2
item.description: Follow-up from HIVE-6739. We cannot wait for Tez 0.4 (or even be sure that it will have TEZ-1004 and TEZ-1005), so I will split the patch into two. Original jira will have the straightforward (but less efficient) fix. This jira will use new relocalize APIs. Depending on relative timing of Tez 0.4 release and Hive 0.13 release, this will go into 0.13 or 0.14 blocked on Tez 0.5
item.summary: Hive HBase query fails on Tez due to missing jars - part 2

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Patch on top of HIVE-6739, when Tez ships new APIs I will update the version and this will be ready

Overall: -1 no tests executed
